reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown comfortable and soft, with a nice pattern of flowers and good warmth for chilly nights. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits perfectly, others report it runs too small. The fabric quality is also mixed, with some praising the material while others find it thin and not authentic flannel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable fit and style
items.body: I am short, size petite. Nightgowns normally are too long and uncomfortable in bed, getting all tangled up and twisted. This nightgown is shorter but still loose and comfortable. Material is lightweight but warm enough for cool nights. Read more
items.author: LM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is lovely!
items.body: Love this it's soft and warm!!! Read more
items.author: Marty McCarthy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not sized correctly.
items.body: Nice, but made very small. Gave to my daughter. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars COZY NIGHT DRESS
items.body: BEAUTIFUL AND COZY NIGHT DRESS Read more
items.author: Anita Bagley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavenly Nightgown!
items.body: It’s fabulous! The fabric is a medium weight flannel that’s really soft and the listed measurements were accurate. It also became softer & fluffier after washing so I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: LKP III

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flannel night gown
items.body: Nice flannel night gown Read more
items.author: Cece

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not flannel
items.body: This is not flannel…says it is..not worth buying if you want soft flannel Read more
items.author: Sissy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
items.body: I was hoping for a thick warm comfortable winter nightgown. What I got was a thin flannel gown that I believe runs small. It was one of the higher priced nightgowns so I was all the more disappointed. I was pressed for time so I just ordered a second nightgown of the same, in a larger size. All of the above was true of the second nightgown as well. Beware. Read more
items.author: Debbie Lampert

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Poinsettia White Red, Pink Floral, Grey Pink Plaid, Yellow Pink, Floral Blue, Leaf Blue, Floral Purple, Blue Rose, Grey/Pink Plaid, Leaf Purple, Yellow Purple, Leaf Green, White Snow Bird, Poinsettia Mint. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
